DOC.brief_summary: The planned Study will be a retrospective study on the effect of ACE's vs. candesartan on cardiovascular events and on health economic effects in a "real life" setting in Sweden.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Angiotensin Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitors Versus Candesartan in Reducing Cardiovascular Events in Primary Treatment of Hypertension
DOC.criteria: all patients found in electronic patient journals at the participating centres, who were prescribed either ACEis (ATCC09AB) or ARBs (C09CD) for hypertension from 1 January 1999 31 December 2007. The first date of such a prescription starts the observation time and is called the index prescription. No history of cardiovascular disease. Ongoing malignancy
